info.title: MRP Change Request Rejection â€“ Read
info.description: This synchronous inbound service enables external systems to read the rejection codes for change requests that are currently configured, along with their descriptions. Change request rejections can be assigned to responses to change requests to give additional information about why a change request was rejected. This service supports only the GET operation.

x-sap-shortText: Read change request rejections using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [MRP Change Request Integration with SAP Business Network(65D)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/65D " Link To BP ")
